food_log.notes: Protein-heavy relative to goal due to carnitas and bars. Endurance work, heat exposure, and high calories softened muscle-retention signaling; less ideal quality but still permissive.
Very high-energy endurance and glute day. Carbohydrates dominated intake; protein spread across meals and fat-paired, supporting performance without aggressive hypertrophy signaling.
Maintenance-to-surplus intake with high carbs supporting endurance. Protein near upper edge but evenly distributed and paired with fat, remaining compatible with slow atrophy goals.
High-volume, fiber-forward soups and vegetables created strong satiety. Moderate calories and protein allowed energy sufficiency without muscle-retention signaling.
Restaurant-heavy, oily, fat-forward surplus day. Episodic indulgence that supports metabolic safety and does not interfere with gradual upper-body atrophy.
Home and restaurant meals including lamb. Protein elevated but spread throughout the day; overall pattern supportive and low-stress.
Mixed flexible day with oatmeal, soup, snacks, and fast food. Calories near maintenance; fat carried intake; protein evenly distributed.
Fuel-heavy day with pizza, candy, chews, and bread-based snacks. Carbs and fats dominated; protein moderate and diffuse.
Light carb-forward intake earlier, followed by a rich Canlis dinner. Protein high but spread across courses and paired with very high fat; celebratory surplus day.

Very refined, sodium-dense, fuel-heavy day with pizza, bars, and chews. Energy availability high; micronutrient density low. Protein high but fat-paired and spread out; episodic and not ideal quality, but unlikely to disrupt atrophy.
Calories were ample for fat gain, but food quality was low and protein crept higher than ideal. No restriction or rebound behavior, which aligns with long-term redistribution goals.

Full day including turkey-and-cheddar sandwich, smoothie, energy chews, Cheez-Its, dark chocolate, soy milk, tofu stir-fry with rice, extra tofu, more soy milk, and gummy candy. Large carb-forward surplus with high but very diffuse, fat-paired protein; permissive overall, though protein crept above ideal.

Earlier intake plus Mediterranean dinner and additional dark chocolate. Ran two 5Ks; clear calorie sufficiency with carb-forward fueling. Protein elevated but diffuse and fat-paired, well buffered by endurance volume.

Cheese sandwich, standard smoothie, vegan dinner (mashed cauliflower; tortillas with vegan cheese; sweet potato; greens with tofu and eggplant), plus a flourless peanut butter chocolate chip cookie and a glazed donut. Late night: 2 servings dark chocolate (6 pieces) and 2 cups soy milk. Solid surplus with well-distributed protein.

Cheese sandwich on Dave's Killer Bread with vegan mayo, standard smoothie, 1 serving dark chocolate (3 pieces), Silk unsweetened soy milk, sesame bagel, pack of Bolt energy chews. Dinner: 4 slices large double mushroom pizza and 2 slices veggie pizza from Pagliacci. Late night: 2 servings dark chocolate (6 pieces) and 1.5 cups soy milk. Solid surplus with well-distributed protein.

Lunch: 2 soft boiled eggs, 2 slices Dave's Killer Bread (toast), standard smoothie. Snack: 2 servings Tim's chips. Dinner: Large Korean BBQ (substantial beef portion, banchan, rice). Late: 1 serving dark chocolate (3 pieces) and soy milk. Protein elevated at 143g but diffuse and fat-paired with BBQ.

If it was pepperoni, thick crust, stuffed crust, or larger/smaller slices, calories and fat can vary substantially (¬±30‚Äì50%). Micronutrients are rough estimates from typical pizza ingredients (flour, cheese, tomato sauce).

items.name: Pizza, slice (assume regular crust cheese pizza)
items.notes: Estimated using typical nutrition for standard cheese pizza slices. User note says pizza; photo does not clearly match pizza, so this is based on the note rather than the image.

food_events.description: Avocado toast with arugula/tomatoes + small fruit pastry/tart

confidence.notes: Moderate uncertainty: exact bread type/thickness, amount of avocado, and whether any olive oil/cheese is present can shift calories/fat notably. Pastry type and filling are unclear, so that item is the biggest source of error. Micronutrients are rough estimates from typical ingredients.

items.name: Avocado toast (dark bread) with avocado, arugula, cherry tomatoes, balsamic glaze
items.portion: 1 open-faced toast (~1 thick slice bread) with ~1/2 medium avocado, small handful arugula, ~4‚Äì6 cherry tomatoes, light drizzle glaze
items.notes: Assumed whole-grain/rye-style bread and ~1/2 avocado based on coverage. Minimal added oil; balsamic glaze assumed small.

items.name: Small fruit pastry/tart (with sliced fruit)
items.notes: Pastry nutrition varies widely; assumed a small buttery tart/puff pastry with a little fruit and/or cream.

food_events.input_text: I had a piece of cherry pie

confidence.notes: Moderate uncertainty because 'a piece' could range from a small sliver to a large restaurant slice; nutrition varies a lot with crust fat/sugar and whether it was homemade vs store-bought. Micronutrients are rough estimates; omega-3 not estimated due to highly variable/typically negligible amounts.

items.name: Cherry pie
items.notes: Assumed a typical commercially prepared/home-style slice with top & bottom crust and sweetened cherry filling. Values can vary widely with slice size, crust type (butter vs shortening), and added ice cream/whipped cream (not included).

food_events.input_text: I had a cheese sandwich on dave's for breakfast

confidence.notes: Main uncertainty is the exact Dave's bread variety (calories/fiber differ) and the amount/type of cheese (1 vs 2 oz; cheddar vs American/provolone). Micronutrients are approximate; omega-3 not estimated because it depends heavily on bread seed content and cheese type and is usually small.

items.name: Dave's Killer Bread (assumed), 2 slices
items.notes: Assumed a typical Dave's Killer Bread (e.g., 21 Whole Grains & Seeds) serving = 2 slices. Nutrition varies by variety.

items.name: Cheddar cheese (assumed)
items.notes: Assumed 2 oz total cheese (common for a cheese sandwich). Type and amount can change calories/fat substantially.

food_events.input_text: I just ate a slice of chocolate cake

confidence.notes: Low-moderate confidence because 'a slice' is ambiguous (could be 250‚Äì700+ kcal depending on size and frosting). Micronutrients (K, Mg, Ca, Fe) are rough typical values for cake; omega-3 not estimated because it depends on specific fats used (butter vs oils) and is usually small/unspecified.

items.name: Chocolate cake (slice)
items.notes: Assumed a typical frosted chocolate layer cake slice. Actual values vary widely by recipe (butter/oil amount, frosting thickness, portion size).
